Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine Ave/71st
ShortDescription: #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 71st, Loomis, 74th, and Racine, due to a festival and parade near Racine Ave/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 71st, Loomis, 74th, and Racine, due to a festival and parade near Racine Ave/71st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/116th
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 115th, Wentworth and 119th due to police activity near Halsted/116th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does tis affect my trip?

#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 115th, Wentworth, 119th, then resume their normal route due to police activity near Halsted/116th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange and Green Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange & 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with normal service. Loop- & Harlem bound trains are still running with delays.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange and 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with normal service following earlier signal problems near Roosevelt.

Loop-bound Orange and Harlem-bound Green Line trains continue to run with significant delays.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#3 King Drive
#4 Cottage Grove
#29 State
#62 Archer
Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
